segments.text: Nice dress . How do I look ? Be honest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm ... you look too dressed up . How about this purple top and these jeans ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , that top is a little too tight , and those jeans aren ’ t dressy enough . And I don ’ t feel comfortable with that . What do you think , Vicky ? You ’ Ve been very quiet up to now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Be confident . Wear styles you ’ re going to be comfortable in .
segments.speaker: S2
